name: mikroe.click.accel14
short_description: Accel 14 Click is digital acceleration and vibration sensor Click board™. It features an ultra-wide bandwidth, low-noise, 3-axis digital vibration sensor, labeled as IIS3DWB, from STMicroelectronics. This Click board™ allows selectable full-scale acceleration measurements in ranges of ±2 g, ±4 g, ±8, and ±16 g in three axes, and it’s capable of measuring accelerations with a bandwidth up to 6 kHz with an output data rate of 26.7 kHz.
